name: 2024 11th International Conference on Geological and Civil Engineering
content: Paper Publishing: Papers submitted to ICGCE 2024 will be sent to program committee members or external reviewers for peer review, and accepted papers will be included into Book Springer Series in Geomechanics and Geoengineering, which will be sent to EI Compendex, Scopus, Inspec, SCImago and other major databases for indexing.
